abstract.p: Correction of June 30 listing of viewing locations for OpSail 2000 parade of tall ships

block.p: A list of viewing locations in Weekend on Friday in a section on the Op Sail 2000 parade of tall ships on the Hudson River today misidentified some usable stretches of shoreline. Construction from 56th Street to 72nd Street makes that area unsuitable. The best viewing sites in Riverside Park are from 72nd Street to 82nd Street and from 101st to 110th Streets.
In addition, the listing omitted a requirement for viewing the ships from the Battery Park City Esplanade. Only people with tickets distributed in a lottery last month will be admitted.
